jobs.title: Software Development Engineer
details: Working on features for a marketing tool that allows marketers to engage millions of customers.

jobs.title: Software Developer Intern
details: Designed and implemented an automated document processing system
Develop and maintain Power BI embedded websites written in React and C#
Build serverless applications and APIs on AWS
Worked with AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform, Python, C#,Javascript, React

jobs.title: Software Development Engineer Intern
details: Develop new features on an Angular web application for customers to query data from AWS Athena and view the results in the application
Design and implement event driven backend architecture to respond to a user’s query
Participate in design and code reviews
Worked with AWS, Java, Typescript, Angular

projects.title: spotify-lyrics
projects.description: A spotify player that gets the lyrics for the song you are currently listening to.

projects.title: Super-Marka-Metrics
projects.description: A supermarket budgeting tool that helped users visualize their spending habits and uses machine learning to predict the cost of future trips to the store.

projects.title: V-Net Lab
projects.description: A network topology tool similar to Microsoft Visio. Allows user to design the layout of their network and configure network devices.

projects.title: Automated Document Processor
projects.description: Event driven, serverless processor that reads, extracts and bills invoice information using optical character recogition. Reduces human interaction with the billing process by 15%

projects.title: zero-touch-sani-system
projects.description: Senior design project. A handsfree sanitation system to sanitize areas in the office. Uses raspberry pi, various perhipals like monition sensors, google cloud IOT, firebase and a web interface to control the device.
